name: Mystery Match Village
description:
Jump into the role of a 1930’s detective as you catch criminals, solve puzzles, and restore the beautiful English village of Kingsfall to its former glory!

Mystery Match Village takes you on a mysterious journey! Your fellow detectives, Emma and Julian, are waiting for you to embrace the stories and resolve the cases!

- Thrilling mysteries - Discover a charming village and all the secrets hiding there!
- Match-3 – swap and match to solve puzzles!
- Hidden Object – find all the clues to conduct your investigations! 
- Village restoration – make Kingsfall your own by earning stars!


Emma and Julian need you!



Mystery Match Village DOES NOT currently support: iPhone 5S, 6, 6 Plus; iPad Mini 2, 3.
